Name: Squareometry
About the game: Squareometry is a game that you control geometry shapes to pass levels with different kind of obstacles. # Get through the obstacles and reach the end of the level. # # Switch between shapes. # # Teleport. # Featuring 30 hand-crafted levels with increasing difficulty; Originally composed soundtrack; You move through the levels with just the arrow keys of your keyboard; Various obstacles to pass.
